trans-unit.source: Karn Liberated
trans-unit.target: 重获自由的卡恩

trans-unit.resname: NPH·1 | Karn Liberated | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: +4: Target player exiles a card from his or her hand.\n-3: Exile target permanent.\n-14: Restart the game, leaving in exile all non-Aura permanent cards exiled with CARDNAME. Then put those cards onto the battlefield under your control.
trans-unit.target: +4；目标牌手从其手上放逐一张牌。 -3：放逐目标永久物。 -14：重新开始游戏，但将所有以CARDNAME放逐之非灵气永久物牌留在放逐区。 然后将这些牌在你的操控下放进战场。

trans-unit.source: Apostle's Blessing
trans-unit.target: 门徒加持

trans-unit.resname: NPH·2 | Apostle's Blessing | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: ({PW} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.)\nTarget artifact or creature you control gains protection from artifacts or from the color of your choice until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: （{W/P}可用{W}或2点生命来支付。） 选择一种颜色，目标由你操控的神器或生物获得反神器保护或是该色之反色保护异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Auriok Survivors
trans-unit.target: 欧瑞克幸存者

trans-unit.resname: NPH·3 | Auriok Survivors | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may return target Equipment card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If you do, you may attach it to CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以将目标武具牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。 若你如此作，你可以将它装备在CARDNAME上。

trans-unit.source: "We are Mirrodin's children. We will reclaim her—one scrap at a time, if we have to."
trans-unit.target: 「我们是秘罗地之子。 我们必将夺回她～如果情况不得已，也要一块块地来。」

trans-unit.source: Blade Splicer
trans-unit.target: 锋刃接合师

trans-unit.resname: NPH·4 | Blade Splicer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, put a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token onto the battlefield.\nGolem creatures you control have first strike.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，将一个3/3无色魔像衍生神器生物放进战场。 由你操控的魔像生物具有先攻异能。

trans-unit.source: Cathedral Membrane
trans-unit.target: 圣堂护层

trans-unit.resname: NPH·5 | Cathedral Membrane | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: ({PW} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.)\nDefender\nWhen CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from the battlefield during combat, it deals 6 damage to each creature it blocked this combat.
trans-unit.target: （{W/P}可用{W}或2点生命来支付。） 守军 当CARDNAME于战斗中从战场置入坟墓场时，它对本次战斗中每个被它阻挡的生物各造成6点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: NPH·6 | Chancellor of the Annex | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chancellor of the Annex
trans-unit.target: 别馆督长

trans-unit.resname: NPH·6 | Chancellor of the Annex | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may reveal this card from your opening hand. If you do, when each opponent casts his or her first spell of the game, counter that spell unless that player pays {1}.\nFlying\nWhenever an opponent casts a spell, counter it unless that player pays {1}.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从你的起手牌中展示此牌。 如果你如此作，当每位牌手施放他在本盘游戏中的第一个咒语时，除非该牌手支付{1}，否则反击之。 飞行 每当任一对手施放咒语时，除非该牌手支付{1}，否则反击之。

trans-unit.source: Dispatch
trans-unit.target: 迅速了结

trans-unit.source: Tap target creature.\nMetalcraft — If you control three or more artifacts, exile that creature.
trans-unit.target: 横置目标生物。 金技～如果你操控三个或更多神器，则放逐该生物。

trans-unit.source: Venser wondered if it could still be called a teleportation spell if the destination is oblivion.
trans-unit.target: 既然终点是虚空，凡瑟不太能确定这是否还称得上是传送咒语。

trans-unit.source: Due Respect
trans-unit.target: 无上敬意

trans-unit.resname: NPH·8 | Due Respect | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Permanents enter the battlefield tapped this turn.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 本回合永久物须横置进场。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "A display of humility is required of those who still possess such frailties."\n—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite
trans-unit.target: 「还保有人性此等缺陷者，总是会表现出来。」 ～大修道士艾蕾侬

trans-unit.resname: NPH·9 | Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 警戒 由你操控的其他生物得+2/+2。 由对手操控的生物得-2/-2。

trans-unit.resname: NPH·9 | Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Gitaxians whisper among themselves of other worlds. If they exist, we must bring Phyrexia's magnificence to them."
trans-unit.target: 「吉塔厦的人私下传着其他世界之流言。 如果他们确实存在，我们必得向之展现非瑞克西亚的壮丽。」

trans-unit.target: 拒斥祭礼

trans-unit.source: Imprisonment teaches revenge. Hobbling teaches resignation.
trans-unit.target: 监禁教出复仇。 跛行教出屈从。

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，选择一项～你获得2点生命；或目标对手失去2点生命。

trans-unit.source: "Skin is the prison of the blessed and the stronghold of the heretic."\n—Argent Etchings, plate 64, passage 17
trans-unit.target: 「皮肤是蒙福者的牢狱，异教徒的堡垒。」 ～《银蚀圣典》64片17段

trans-unit.source: Mirrans were broken down and rebuilt, made to be loyal servants of the force they had fought.

trans-unit.source: Loxodon Convert

trans-unit.source: With Phyrexia's victory at hand, each sect began perfecting its vision.

trans-unit.source: Underling Ethu's 263rd report read simply "Yes, my lord. Overwhelmingly, my lord." This marked the end of the Mirran-Phyrexian War.
trans-unit.target: 部下艾屠第263次的报告只有这样：「是的，长官。压倒性胜利，长官。」 秘罗人与非瑞克西亚人的战争就此终结。

If you do, at the beginning of the first upkeep, each opponent puts the top seven cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.\nFlying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from an opponent's graveyard without paying its mana cost.

trans-unit.source: Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur
trans-unit.target: 核心卜算师金吉塔厦

trans-unit.resname: NPH·37 | Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nAt the beginning of your end step, draw seven cards.\nEach opponent's maximum hand size is reduced by seven.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 在你的结束步骤开始时，抓七张牌。 每位对手的手牌上限减少七张。

trans-unit.resname: NPH·37 | Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It is not a goal, but a process—the process of creating the perfect Phyrexia."
trans-unit.target: 「这不是目标，而是过程～用来创造完美的非瑞克西亚。」

trans-unit.source: Mental Misstep
trans-unit.target: 心灵失足

trans-unit.resname: NPH·38 | Mental Misstep | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: ({PU} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)\nCounter target spell with converted mana cost 1.
trans-unit.target: （{U/P}可用{U}或2点生命来支付。） 反击目标总法术力费用为1的咒语。

trans-unit.source: "Your first mistake was thinking I would let you live long enough to make a second."\n—Sarnvax, Gitaxian sective
trans-unit.target: 「你的第一个错误，就是以为我会让你活到犯下第二个错误。」 ～吉塔厦组的萨恩瓦

trans-unit.source: Mindculling
trans-unit.target: 心灵挑拣

trans-unit.source: You draw two cards and target opponent discards two cards.
trans-unit.target: 你抓两张牌且目标对手弃两张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Why infiltrate their strongholds when what we seek resides in such a poorly guarded safe?"\n—Malcator, Executor of Synthesis
trans-unit.target: 「既然我们要找的东西摆在防卫如此松懈的保险箱里，又何必要渗透他们的要塞？」 ～合成执行人麻卡特

trans-unit.source: Numbing Dose
trans-unit.target: 麻木剂

trans-unit.resname: NPH·40 | Numbing Dose | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant artifact or creature\nEnchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.\nAt the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted permanent's controller, that player loses 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 结附于神器或生物 所结附的永久物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。 在所结附的永久物之操控者的维持开始时，该牌手失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Ingester
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚摄食兽

trans-unit.resname: NPH·41 | Phyrexian Ingester | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Imprint — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may exile target nontoken creature.\nCARDNAME gets +X/+Y, where X is the exiled creature card's power and Y is its toughness.
trans-unit.target: 压印～当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以放逐目标非衍生物的生物。 CARDNAME得+X/+Y，X为所放逐之生物牌的力量，Y为该牌的防御力。

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Metamorph
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚蜕变妖

trans-unit.resname: NPH·42 | Phyrexian Metamorph | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: ({PU} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)\nYou may have CARDNAME enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact or creature on the battlefield, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.
trans-unit.target: （{U/P}可用{U}或2点生命来支付。） 你可以使CARDNAME当成战场上任一神器或生物的复制品来进入战场，但它额外具有神器此类别。

trans-unit.source: Psychic Barrier
trans-unit.target: 心灵障壁

trans-unit.resname: NPH·43 | Psychic Barrier | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target creature spell. Its controller loses 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标生物咒语。 其操控者失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "I tolerate Phyrexians because the dragon requires it. But I have no patience for uninvited guests."\n—Tezzeret
trans-unit.target: 「我能容忍非瑞克西亚人，因为龙王有这需要。 但我对不请自来的客人毫无耐心。」 ～泰兹瑞

trans-unit.source: Psychic Surgery
trans-unit.target: 心灵手术

trans-unit.resname: NPH·44 | Psychic Surgery | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent shuffles his or her library, you may look at the top two cards of that library. You may exile one of those cards. Then put the rest on top of that library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手将其牌库洗牌时，你可以检视该牌库顶的两张牌。 你可以放逐其中一张牌。 然后将其余的牌以任意顺序置于该牌库顶。

trans-unit.source: Spined Thopter
trans-unit.target: 刺棘振翼机

trans-unit.resname: NPH·45 | Spined Thopter | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: ({PU} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)\nFlying
trans-unit.target: （{U/P}可用{U}或2点生命来支付。） 飞行

trans-unit.source: "I appreciate the depravity of noble designs turned to devious ends."\n—Tezzeret
trans-unit.target: 「高贵设计变成邪道器具，我很欣赏此般堕落。」 ～泰兹瑞

trans-unit.source: Spire Monitor
trans-unit.target: 尖塔监卫

trans-unit.resname: NPH·46 | Spire Monitor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)\nFlying
trans-unit.target: 闪现 （你可以于你能够施放瞬间的时机下施放此咒语。） 飞行

trans-unit.source: Each monitor is given an eye for each spire it is to guard.
trans-unit.target: 监卫要负责看守几个塔，就会获取几个眼睛。

trans-unit.source: Tezzeret's Gambit
trans-unit.target: 泰兹瑞的计策

trans-unit.resname: NPH·47 | Tezzeret's Gambit | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: ({PU} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)\nDraw two cards, then proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)
trans-unit.target: （{U/P}可用{U}或2点生命来支付。） 抓两张牌，然后增殖。 （你选择任意数量其上有指示物的永久物和／或牌手，然后在其上放置一个它已有之类别的指示物。）

trans-unit.source: Vapor Snag
trans-unit.target: 毒气阻碍

trans-unit.resname: NPH·48 | Vapor Snag | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Its controller loses 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。 其操控者失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "This creature is inadequate. Send it to the splicers for innovation."\n—Malcator, Executor of Synthesis
trans-unit.target: 「这生物派不上用场。 送它去给接合师改造。」 ～合成执行人麻卡特

trans-unit.source: Viral Drake
trans-unit.target: 病毒龙兽

trans-unit.resname: NPH·49 | Viral Drake | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nInfect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)\n{3}{U}: Proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 侵染 （此生物会以-1/-1指示物的方式对生物造成伤害，并以中毒指示物的方式对牌手造成伤害。） {3}{U}：增殖。 （你选择任意数量其上有指示物的永久物和／或牌手，然后在其上放置一个它已有之类别的指示物。）

trans-unit.source: Wing Splicer
trans-unit.target: 飞翼接合师

trans-unit.resname: NPH·50 | Wing Splicer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, put a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token onto the battlefield.\nGolem creatures you control have flying.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，将一个3/3无色魔像衍生神器生物放进战场。 由你操控的魔像生物具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.source: Xenograft
trans-unit.target: 异种接殖

trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.\nEach creature you control is the chosen type in addition to its other types.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一种生物类别。 每个由你操控的生物均额外具有该类别。

trans-unit.source: "I despise Vorinclex and his slobberings about 'evolution.' Only I know true progress."\n—Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur
trans-unit.target: 「我瞧不起弗霖凯和他讲得口沫横飞的『演化』。只有我才知道真正的过程。」 ～核心卜算师金吉塔厦

trans-unit.source: Blind Zealot
trans-unit.target: 狂信盲者

trans-unit.resname: NPH·52 | Blind Zealot | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice it. If you do, destroy target creature that player controls.
trans-unit.target: 威吓 （此生物只能被神器和／或与它有共通颜色的生物阻挡。） 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以牺牲它。 若你如此作，消灭目标由该牌手操控的生物。

trans-unit.resname: NPH·53 | Caress of Phyrexia | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Caress of Phyrexia
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚抚触

trans-unit.resname: NPH·53 | Caress of Phyrexia | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player draws three cards, loses 3 life, and gets three poison counters.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手抓三张牌，失去3点生命，且得到三个中毒指示物。

trans-unit.resname: NPH·53 | Caress of Phyrexia | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I am weak. Make . . . me . . . ideal."
trans-unit.target: 「我很弱。 让...我...完美。」

trans-unit.resname: NPH·54 | Chancellor of the Dross | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chancellor of the Dross
trans-unit.target: 蔓非沼督长

trans-unit.resname: NPH·54 | Chancellor of the Dross | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may reveal this card from your opening hand. If you do, at the beginning of the first upkeep, each opponent loses 3 life, then you gain life equal to the life lost this way.\nFlying, lifelink
trans-unit.target: 你可以从你的起手牌中展示此牌。 如果你如此作，则在第一个维持开始时，每位对手各失去3点生命，然后你获得牌手以此法失去的生命总和。 飞行，系命

trans-unit.source: Dementia Bat
trans-unit.target: 痴呆蝙蝠

trans-unit.resname: NPH·55 | Dementia Bat | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{4}{B}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Target player discards two cards.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {4}{B}，牺牲CARDNAME：目标牌手弃两张牌。

trans-unit.source: "When terror outweighs all other thoughts, they will understand that I am the true Father of Machines."\n—Azax-Azog, the Demon Thane
trans-unit.target: 「当恐怖压过其他的思绪，他们会了解我是真正的机械之父。」 ～恶魔伯爵亚札佐

trans-unit.source: Despise
trans-unit.target: 鄙视

trans-unit.source: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a creature or planeswalker card from it. That player discards that card.
trans-unit.target: 目标对手展示其手牌。 你选择其中一张生物或鹏洛客牌。 该牌手弃掉该牌。

trans-unit.source: "Truth is always a weapon in your enemies' hands."\n—Geth, Lord of the Vault
trans-unit.target: 「真相总是敌人手上的武器。」 ～黯窖之王盖司

trans-unit.source: Dismember
trans-unit.target: 肢解

trans-unit.source: ({PB} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)\nTarget creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: （{B/P}可用{B}或2点生命来支付。） 目标生物得-5/-5直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "You serve Phyrexia. Your pieces would better serve Phyrexia elsewhere."\n—Azax-Azog, the Demon Thane
trans-unit.target: 「你会服侍非瑞克西亚。 你的碎块会在他处将非瑞克西亚服侍得更好。」 ～恶魔伯爵亚札佐

trans-unit.source: Enslave
trans-unit.target: 奴役

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nYou control enchanted creature.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, enchanted creature deals 1 damage to its owner.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 你操控所结附的生物。 在你的维持开始时，所结附的生物对其拥有者造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Phyrexia extended its command until there was nothing left to take.
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚将不断扩张版图，直到无所不在为止。

trans-unit.source: Entomber Exarch
trans-unit.target: 入土督教

trans-unit.resname: NPH·59 | Entomber Exarch | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose one — Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand; or target opponent reveals his or her hand, you choose a noncreature card from it, then that player discards that card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，选择一项～将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上；或目标对手展示其手牌，你选择其中一张非生物牌，然后该牌手弃掉该牌。

trans-unit.source: Evil Presence
trans-unit.target: 邪恶存在

trans-unit.resname: NPH·60 | Evil Presence | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant land\nEnchanted land is a Swamp.
trans-unit.target: 结附于地 所结附的地是沼泽。

trans-unit.source: "The Accorders would lament the transformation of their cherished lands, had they lived to see it."\n—Sheoldred, Whispering One
trans-unit.target: 「轮驻军会悲叹他们的宝贵大地变化至此；如果他们能活着看到的话。」 ～细语者希欧蕊

trans-unit.source: Geth's Verdict
trans-unit.target: 盖司的裁定

trans-unit.resname: NPH·61 | Geth's Verdict | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player sacrifices a creature and loses 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手牺牲一个生物且失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "Everyone should owe you something."\n—Geth, Lord of the Vault
trans-unit.target: 「任何人都该欠你些什么。」 ～黯窖之王盖司

trans-unit.source: Glistening Oil
trans-unit.target: 烁油

trans-unit.resname: NPH·62 | Glistening Oil | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has infect.
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on enchanted creature.
When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return CARDNAME to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物具有侵染异能。 在你的维持开始时，在所结附的生物上放置一个-1/-1指示物。 当CARDNAME从战场进入坟墓场时，将CARDNAME移回其拥有者的手上。

trans-unit.source: Grim Affliction
trans-unit.target: 残酷折磨

trans-unit.resname: NPH·63 | Grim Affliction | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature, then proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)
trans-unit.target: 在目标生物上放置一个-1/-1指示物，然后增殖。 （你选择任意数量其上有指示物的永久物和／或牌手，然后在其上放置一个它已有之类别的指示物。）

trans-unit.source: Even the small wounds let hope bleed out.
trans-unit.target: 就连小伤口也会让希望流干。

trans-unit.source: Ichor Explosion
trans-unit.target: 脓水爆发

trans-unit.resname: NPH·64 | Ichor Explosion | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast CARDNAME, sacrifice a creature.\nAll creatures get -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物，以作为施放CARDNAME的额外费用。 所有生物得-X/-X直到回合结束，X为所牺牲之生物的力量。

trans-unit.source: The first explosion that didn't excite goblins.
trans-unit.target: 这是鬼怪第一次不觉得爆炸很刺激。

trans-unit.source: Life's Finale
trans-unit.target: 生灵终结

trans-unit.resname: NPH·65 | Life's Finale | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures, then search target opponent's library for up to three creature cards and put them into his or her graveyard. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有生物，然后从目标对手的牌库中搜寻至多三张生物牌，并将这些牌置入其坟墓场。 然后该牌手将他的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: The feeble resistance of the flesh is over. Phyrexia spreads its shadow over all.
trans-unit.target: 肉身的微弱抵抗已经结束。 非瑞克西亚的阴影笼罩一切。

trans-unit.source: Mortis Dogs
trans-unit.target: 死尸狗群

trans-unit.resname: NPH·66 | Mortis Dogs | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.\nWhen CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, target player loses life equal to its power.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，它得+2/+0直到回合结束。 当CARDNAME从战场置入坟墓场时，目标牌手失去等同于其力量的生命。

trans-unit.source: Parasitic Implant
trans-unit.target: 植入寄生

trans-unit.resname: NPH·67 | Parasitic Implant | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, enchanted creature's controller sacrifices it and you put a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 在你的维持开始时，所结附的生物之操控者将它牺牲，且你将一个1/1无色秘耳衍生神器生物放进战场。

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Obliterator
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚抹煞兽

trans-unit.resname: NPH·68 | Phyrexian Obliterator | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nWhenever a source deals damage to CARDNAME, that source's controller sacrifices that many permanents.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 每当一个来源对CARDNAME造成伤害时，该来源的操控者牺牲等量的永久物。

trans-unit.source: "Behold blessed perfection."\n—Sheoldred, Whispering One
trans-unit.target: 「好好欣赏蒙福的完美。」 ～细语者希欧蕊

trans-unit.source: Pith Driller
trans-unit.target: 钻髓怪

trans-unit.resname: NPH·69 | Pith Driller | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: ({PB} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
trans-unit.target: （{B/P}可用{B}或2点生命来支付。） 当CARDNAME进战场时，在目标生物上放置一个-1/-1指示物。

trans-unit.source: After boring up through the crust of Mirrodin, it turned its expertise upon the surface dwellers.
trans-unit.target: 他们钻出秘罗地的地壳之后，便将自己的专长用在地面居民身上。

trans-unit.source: Postmortem Lunge
trans-unit.target: 死后冲刺

trans-unit.resname: NPH·70 | Postmortem Lunge | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: ({PB} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)\nReturn target creature card with converted mana cost X from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: （{B/P}可用{B}或2点生命来支付。） 将目标总法术力费用等于X的生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。 它获得敏捷。 在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它放逐。

trans-unit.source: Praetor's Grasp
trans-unit.target: 魔判官之攫

trans-unit.resname: NPH·71 | Praetor's Grasp | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search target opponent's library for a card and exile it face down. Then that player shuffles his or her library. You may look at and play that card for as long as it remains exiled.
trans-unit.target: 从目标对手的牌库中搜寻一张牌，并牌面朝下地放逐该牌。 然后该牌手将他的牌库洗牌。 只要该牌持续被移出游戏，你便可以检视并施放它。

trans-unit.source: Sheoldred weaves every thread of information into a noose to hang her enemies.
trans-unit.target: 希欧蕊将一切资讯织成让敌人窒息的绳套。

trans-unit.resname: NPH·72 | Reaper of Sheoldred | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Reaper of Sheoldred
trans-unit.target: 希欧蕊镰刀手

trans-unit.resname: NPH·72 | Reaper of Sheoldred | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)\nWhenever a source deals damage to CARDNAME, that source's controller gets a poison counter.
trans-unit.target: 侵染 （此生物会以-1/-1指示物的方式对生物造成伤害，并以中毒指示物的方式对牌手造成伤害。） 每当一个来源对CARDNAME造成伤害时，该来源的操控者得到一个中毒指示物。

trans-unit.resname: NPH·73 | Sheoldred, Whispering One | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sheoldred, Whispering One
trans-unit.target: 细语者希欧蕊

trans-unit.resname: NPH·73 | Sheoldred, Whispering One | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Swampwalk\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.\nAt the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature.
trans-unit.target: 沼泽行者 在你的维持开始时，将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。 在每位对手的维持开始时，该牌手牺牲一个生物。

trans-unit.source: Surgical Extraction
trans-unit.target: 手术摘除

trans-unit.source: ({PB} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)\nChoose target card in a graveyard other than a basic land card. Search its owner's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

trans-unit.target: 「如果它该活着，就不该那么容易给打烂。」 ～格莉莎

trans-unit.source: Once a pariah, now Mirrodin's greatest hope.

trans-unit.source: Myr Superion
trans-unit.target: 精壮秘耳

trans-unit.resname: NPH·146 | Myr Superion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Spend only mana produced by creatures to cast CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 只能以生物产生的法术力来施放CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Two kinds of myr survive: the powerful and those that stay close by them.
trans-unit.target: 能存活的秘耳有两种：强大的，以及待在前者左右的。

trans-unit.source: Necropouncer
trans-unit.target: 袭杀装

trans-unit.source: Living weapon (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, put a 0/0 black Germ creature token onto the battlefield, then attach this to it.)\nEquipped creature gets +3/+1 and has haste.\nEquip {2}
Omen Machine
trans-unit.target: 预兆机械

trans-unit.resname: NPH·148 | Omen Machine | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Players can't draw cards.\nAt the beginning of each player's draw step, that player exiles the top card of his or her library. If it's a land card, the player puts it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, the player casts it without paying its mana cost if able.
trans-unit.target: 牌手不能抓牌。 在每位牌手的抓牌步骤开始时，该牌手放逐其牌库顶牌。 若该牌是地牌，该牌手将它放进战场。 若否，且该牌手能施放它，则施放之且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: Pestilent Souleater
trans-unit.target: 瘟疫食灵妖

trans-unit.resname: NPH·149 | Pestilent Souleater | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {PB}: CARDNAME gains infect until end of turn. ({PB} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life. A creature with infect deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
trans-unit.target: {B/P}：CARDNAME获得侵染异能直到回合结束。 （{B/P}可用{B}或2点生命来支付。 具侵染的生物会以-1/-1指示物的方式对生物造成伤害，并以中毒指示物的方式对牌手造成伤害。）

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Hulk
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚巨汉

trans-unit.source: An invasion weapon of ages past, the glistening oil contained the blueprints of countless atrocities.
trans-unit.target: 烁油是年代久远的侵略武器，包含着无数的丑恶蓝图。

trans-unit.source: Pristine Talisman
trans-unit.target: 纯净饰符

trans-unit.resname: NPH·151 | Pristine Talisman | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. You gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "Tools and artisans can be destroyed, but the act of creation is inviolate."\n—Elspeth Tirel
trans-unit.target: 「工具与工匠可能会毁灭，但创作此行为将生生不息。」 ～艾紫培提瑞

trans-unit.resname: NPH·152 | Shrine of Boundless Growth | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shrine of Boundless Growth
trans-unit.target: 不息成长祭祠

trans-unit.resname: NPH·152 | Shrine of Boundless Growth | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a green spell, put a charge counter on CARDNAME.\n{T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Add {1} to your mana pool for each charge counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始或每当你施放绿色咒语时，在CARDNAME上放置一个充电指示物。 {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：CARDNAME上每有一个充电指示物，便加{1}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.resname: NPH·153 | Shrine of Burning Rage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shrine of Burning Rage
trans-unit.target: 火热愤怒祭祠

trans-unit.resname: NPH·153 | Shrine of Burning Rage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a red spell, put a charge counter on CARDNAME.\n{3}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: CARDNAME deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始或每当你施放红色咒语时，在CARDNAME上放置一个充电指示物。 {3}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：CARDNAME对目标生物或牌手造成伤害，其数量等同于CARDNAME上充电指示物的数量。

trans-unit.resname: NPH·154 | Shrine of Limitless Power | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shrine of Limitless Power
trans-unit.target: 无尽力量祭祠

trans-unit.resname: NPH·154 | Shrine of Limitless Power | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a black spell, put a charge counter on CARDNAME.\n{4}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Target player discards a card for each charge counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始或每当你施放黑色咒语时，在CARDNAME上放置一个充电指示物。 {4}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：CARDNAME上每有一个充电指示物，目标牌手便弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: NPH·155 | Shrine of Loyal Legions | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shrine of Loyal Legions
trans-unit.target: 忠贞军团祭祠

trans-unit.resname: NPH·155 | Shrine of Loyal Legions | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a white spell, put a charge counter on CARDNAME.\n{3}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Put a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token onto the battlefield for each charge counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始或每当你施放白色咒语时，在CARDNAME上放置一个充电指示物。 {3}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：CARDNAME上每有一个充电指示物，便将一个1/1无色秘耳衍生神器生物放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: NPH·156 | Shrine of Piercing Vision | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shrine of Piercing Vision
trans-unit.target: 锐利视线祭祠

trans-unit.resname: NPH·156 | Shrine of Piercing Vision | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a blue spell, put a charge counter on CARDNAME.\n{T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of charge counters on CARDNAME. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始或每当你施放蓝色咒语时，在CARDNAME上放置一个充电指示物。 {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：检视你牌库顶的X张牌，X为CARDNAME上的充电指示物数量。 将其中一张置于你手上，其余的牌则以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.source: Sickleslicer
trans-unit.target: 镰切装

trans-unit.source: Living weapon (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, put a 0/0 black Germ creature token onto the battlefield, then attach this to it.)\nEquipped creature gets +2/+2.\nEquip {4}
Soul Conduit
trans-unit.target: 灵魂渠道

trans-unit.resname: NPH·158 | Soul Conduit | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {6}, {T}: Two target players exchange life totals.
trans-unit.target: {6}，{T}：两位目标牌手彼此交换总生命。

trans-unit.source: "You have an unhealthy attachment to your selfhood. I can help you with that."\n—Malcator, Executor of Synthesis
trans-unit.target: 「你的自我有着不健康的附加物。 我可以帮得上忙。」 ～合成执行人麻卡特

trans-unit.source: Spellskite
trans-unit.target: 蔑咒兽

trans-unit.source: {PU}: Change a target of target spell or ability to CARDNAME. ({PU} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)
trans-unit.target: {U/P}：将目标咒语或异能的目标改为CARDNAME。 （{U/P}可用{U}或2点生命来支付。）

trans-unit.source: "Let's show Vorinclex that progress doesn't always need teeth or claws."\n—Malcator, Executor of Synthesis
trans-unit.target: 「让弗霖凯瞧瞧，进展不一定需要尖牙利爪。」 ～合成执行人麻卡特

trans-unit.source: Surge Node
trans-unit.target: 翻腾节点

trans-unit.resname: NPH·160 | Surge Node | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with six charge counters on it.\n{1}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from CARDNAME: Put a charge counter on target artifact.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有六个充电指示物。 {1}，{T}，从CARDNAME上移去一个充电指示物：在目标神器上放置一个充电指示物。

trans-unit.source: Without a foe to focus on, the machine priests had time to indulge in new sciences.
trans-unit.target: 没有仇敌可供投注精力，机械牧师便有时间沉迷于新科学。

trans-unit.resname: NPH·161 | Sword of War and Peace | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sword of War and Peace
trans-unit.target: 战宁剑

trans-unit.resname: NPH·161 | Sword of War and Peace | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from red and from white.\nWhenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, CARDNAME deals damage to that player equal to the number of cards in his or her hand and you gain 1 life for each card in your hand.\nEquip {2}
Torpor Orb
trans-unit.target: 迟钝法球

trans-unit.resname: NPH·162 | Torpor Orb | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures entering the battlefield don't cause abilities to trigger.
trans-unit.target: 进战场的生物不会触发异能。

trans-unit.source: "Phyrexia is certainly dangerous, but I have to admire some of its innovations."\n—Tezzeret
trans-unit.target: 「非瑞克西亚当然危险之至，但某些创新确实令我赞许。」 ～泰兹瑞

trans-unit.source: Trespassing Souleater
trans-unit.target: 入侵食灵妖

trans-unit.resname: NPH·163 | Trespassing Souleater | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {PU}: CARDNAME is unblockable this turn. ({PU} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)
trans-unit.target: {U/P}：CARDNAME本回合不能被阻挡。 （{U/P}可用{U}或2点生命来支付。）

trans-unit.source: "We thank the souleaters for surveilling our lives that we may be preserved from our own ignorance."\n—Drones' hymn of gratitude
trans-unit.target: 「感谢食灵妖监管行止，导正无知下仆。」 ～奴工感念曲

trans-unit.source: Unwinding Clock
trans-unit.target: 松卷钟

trans-unit.resname: NPH·164 | Unwinding Clock | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Untap all artifacts you control during each other player's untap step.
trans-unit.target: 在其他牌手的重置步骤中，重置所有由你操控的神器。

trans-unit.source: "The partisans have unearthed a strange artifact. None know its origin, but it gives them hope of a life beyond."\n—Elspeth's journal
trans-unit.target: 「游击队挖出古怪的神器。 没人知道其来源，但却给予他们往后生命的希望。」 ～艾紫培的日志

trans-unit.source: Phyrexia's Core
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚核心

trans-unit.resname: NPH·165 | Phyrexia's Core | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\n{1}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: You gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {1}，{T}，牺牲一个神器：你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "So even the heart of our world has succumbed."\n—Koth of the Hammer
trans-unit.target: 「原来连我们世界的心脏都屈服了。」 ～锤族的寇斯
